location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing, for Bruce's information, copy of a letter from Mohomed ben Nasir [Muhammad bin Nasir al-Jabri] to Sir Evan Nepean, undated, confirming his subservience to the British, and of a letter from Francis Warden to Richard Thomas Goodwin, dated 1 April 1816, requesting him to draft a reply expressing the British Government's goodwill towards him.
